title: India’s Olyv Secures $23 Million Series B to Scale Financial Inclusion Platform; SMBC Asia Rising Fund Joins Round
tags: SMBC Asia Rising Fund Leads WIZ.AI’s Series BWIZ.AI, a Singapore-based AI company pioneering the enterprise application of large language models (LLMs) in Southeast Asia, has announced the successful closing of its Series B funding round, raising tens of millions of USD. The round was led by SMBC Asia Rising Fund, the corporate venture capital arm ofJapan FinTech ObserverNorbert Gehrke
